text:
"The Crying Child" is an American television horror movie. It was directed by Robert Michael Lewis. It is based on a Barbara Mertz novel.
The movie stars Mariel Hemingway and George DelHoyo.
Plot.
After their son dies, a couple moves to a new house in order to forget. Suddenly, the woman starts to hear baby cries all over her home. She is the only one who can hear them.
